comments.comment: From that kid who screams while playing video games to actually being a father, I'm genuinely so happy for you Felix
Bjorn showing the middle finger is a declaration that he ain't just a month old baby... He's a 9 year old too..
Felix living in Japan grants him a normal life, truly cool to see such a notable public figure live normally and enjoy life to the fullest
He went from screaming at games to becoming the calmest coolest dad ever. I bet even Felix didn't anticipate how much his life was going to change.
Marzia did a really good job of editing this, it really feels like a home video for them to watch back on for the memories and that ending with the sound of a vhs getting taken out seals it.

Dude is literally living in the “Good Ending”, and frankly, he deserves every bit of it. 

I’ve watched since 2013, every evolution, every improvement, and every setback. This man, after everything he’s done for us, deserves to live the good life. 

Brofist, Pewds
Bjorn's little smirk when he, Felix, and Momo and were laying down was hilariously cute
Björn is going to be so lucky if he grows up speaking English, Swedish, Japanese, and Italian

15-20 years from now Bjorn is gonna watch all of these videos with him in it and we're gonna be much older at that time. It's quite wholesome to see Felix and Marzia when they were just gf/bf....to now having a happy family. I'm so glad that I get to witness their journey and onwards to the future. Love y'all Kjellberg family!
just watching you, Marzia, Momo, Edgar, and now Björn live your best life never fails to put a smile on my face
Felix and Marzia being parents is legit wholesome, so happy for their new chapter of life
He's living an absolutely amazing and peaceful life in Japan, practically being away from all fame and people coming to interrupt him irl, while still being connected with his community..!
13:47 Lmao, Bjorn giving Felix the middle finger is so precious! <3
I dont think you understand how calming and happy this content makes me. I can't thank you enough for sharing, nor Marzia for editing in such a beautiful way.
I didn't know Marzia was editing ! She does such a wonderful job - the tone and pace and vibe are all so soothing and calm. Brava
It's great to see you doing so well Felix!

I literally cry watching pewds vids since he’s moved to Japan it’s just so sweet to see him and Marzia live out there dreams and be able to live a peaceful normal life. They both look so content with themselves. It’s so sweet and I’m so happy for them

Bjorn is absolutely gonna love watching these when he's older
it's so heartwarming, keep doing great Felix
It’s heartwarming to see how satisfied both Marzia and Felix look after Bjorn was born.
Y'know, seeing where Felix ended up in life really gives me hope for a better tomorrow for everyone.
I love how Felix acts like a new dad like he didn't raise us all those years. Truly an awesome father moment keep it up and we all wish the best
unlike most parents, it warms my heart to see felix and marzia give the same care to their dogs after having a baby
He looks so happy and it makes me wanna move to Japan.
i love that pewds chooses to share his life with us and even share bjorn while keeping it very tasteful. Seriously, thank you Pewds

It's just occurred to me that Björn is probably gonna grow up speaking 4 languages. Swedish, Italian, Japanese and English is such a wild mix, but it's honestly fantastic to have that level of variety.
It’s crazy to think how young I was watching him and now he’s a dad

I’m gonna cry, I’ve never been so happy for someone on Youtube. It feels weird to have second hand happiness for someone I’ve never met but seeing how far pewds has come since amnesia is just so amazing.
It’s so sweet that you as a father is showing your life as a Dad with Marzia. We need more Dads to do this not many do it.
Pewdiepie such good uncle taking care of Felix's kid while Felix is busy recording all his moments and editing videos
Grew up in watching you, impacted my life heavily as a kid so I’m sure your son will be happy and proud of you being his father.
I love how supportive they are with each other during the bouldering, really sweet and makes me happy seeing them so happy
Watching Marcia being a mom is so special, feels like we are all growing up.
He raised an entire generation of kids he's THE man that deserves this life
I can’t believe how much he’s changed.. I remember watching him scream at video games when I was 7. And now he’s a dad with a bright future ahead of him
Fucking hell my childhood became a great dad figure making me cry so damn hard. That kid Bjorn is so lucky to have you both. I wish you and your family a long happy life together. Lots of love
Was just in Japan last month for first time; having enjoyed these vlogs for a while now; it made the trip over even more special!

I share the same birthday as Felix and recently found out that I will be a first-time dad in February. Most people, when you talk to them about becoming a parent, tell you how hard it will be and how little sleep you'll get. These videos have been so refreshing and are getting me excited and unafraid of being a dad. Thanks Felix!
if you told me 10 years ago that i'd be watching a vlog of pewds while being a DAD i'd never believe it  but damn  i'm so happy that everything went so well for him and his family. <3
Marzia’s little giggles are so adorable
Still can’t believe he’s a dad now. How fast time flies.
I feel old seeing him as a Dad now, We really went from Bros to now Uncles
Man, you and Marzia just seem like the best parents. Björn is such a cute little guy! Having that babysitter sounds like a real lifesaver. So happy for you guys!

I’m so grateful that even though he’s a busy dad now he’s still able to take and share with us through his journey. It feels like we’ve all grown with Felix and his little family and it’s truly beautiful, thank you Felix!

i love seeing marzia in these vlogs! im so glad shes doing well after having björn! i actually found pewdiepie through marzia back in like 2013 and miss seeing her all the time! glad you guys are doing well, love from the US!️

Man I really love the way this guy has changed his life, so that he can cherish it as per his rules, and not as per the wishes of outside influences. I started as a pewdiepie fan , but now I am more of a Felix fan. I wish I could become like you Felix.
Felix as a dad is the sweetest thing ever. I absolutely love seeing him bonding and enjoying being with Bjorn

It always warms my heart seeing felix so happy. I remember watching him during his amnesia days with stephano and BARREL. And now a dad with a beautiful wife. Im so happy for you bro. You deserve the best
It’s so good to see how much felix is loving life in Japan. I love the direction he went with the vlogs he always seems so happy since he moved just getting to live his life
Deciding not to get any desserts at the restaurant and hearing "we will get snacks at amusement part" is the most DAD thing Felix could ever say.
I am a Japanese and I feel happy to see Mariza and Felix spending normal life and blend into Japan: going to family restaurants, visit aquarium with their baby, and so on.

Watching his videos along the years I feel like I grew alongside Pewds. I grew as his content evolved, as he matured, got married, moved to Japan, and now become a dad. And now we get to see his son and family grow. Sincerely wishing the best for this family.
23:10 - That little smile from Bjorn was so cute it made me smirk. It's like he knows Felix turned the camera his way.
When he paused before saying Maya's name @7:32 ... I'm glad to see you guys out and about enjoying life with baby Bjorn <3
I used to watch Felix for laughs and now look at me - almost crying every new video, i dont know what to say. Happy for you (and your family), dude, that's a nice life to live!

This is pretty unbelievable actually, I remember watching this guy screeching like little girl to Amnesia mods and now he is walking with his baby on his chest like an actual adult. I have to be honest, I teared up a little man.. pewdiepie was on youtube for so long he deserves some rest with his new family <3
It's so heartwarming to see that how much Felix loves his son!
Imagine being the child of them. I would be so grateful for the work he and she put into their life.
Time is being so gracious to Felix.  it makes me so happy to see him and Marzia happy :)
My heart melts every time Pewds looks at his and Marzia's baby. Such wonderful people that became wonderful parents too. I adore these vlogs so much T.T
Every time I watch these vlogs it makes me wanna move to Japan lol

from watching you play Amnesia, to sharing with us your new girlfriend and now you being a dad is crazy. Thank you Felix for the countless hours of entertainment you provided and I hope little Bjorn grows up healthy and proud of his parents because both of you are such amazing human beings!
Much love

Pewdiepie's vlogs always make me feel all warm and fuzzy inside whenever I watch them. These other "vloggers" need to take notes because this is the right way to get it done! We need more content like this!

I love how good of a dad Felix is turning out to be. You can just see how much he loves his family and how instead of letting all the new stress get to him he turned it into an opportunity to also work on something like learning more Kanji. :)
felix in the stages of fatherhood is so heartwarming
Still feels like yesterday when Pewds was screaming in amnesia. Man does time fly..
These vlogs are liberally so cozy and relaxing, i feel my soul healing

its so surreal seeing such a key component of my childhood, someone i grew up with go through fatherhood with me. my daughter is four months and its so cool seeing my favorite content creator go through the same beautiful moments as me.

Our son just turned 1. I find it increasingly entertaining seeing you guys start your young family around the same time. We lead very different life styles but you can tell how much love and passion you all have and I can 100% relate to that. I know things may change but I hope one day I’ll get to watch some of your videos with my son and tell him your family basically started when ours did! Good luck to you all and thanks for the entertainment!
Marzia bouldering after having a baby is inspiring. After I had a baby it was rough to do anything! You guys are the best parents. Felix you are so involved. What a great video!
Dude imagine bjorn growing up and realizing what a king his father is and has a whole army with him online
I can't explain how surreal it felt to watch Felix speak to his baby, the look on his face. He looks so happy and content.
Seeing them this happy is just so contagious.

I’m so happy seeing felix in this kind of moments right now, it’s the same feels as my cousin, they became dad at the same time! Idk why but it gives me happiness seeing them having a child, like they have this different smile that I cannot explain.
Wow, PewDiePie, this 'Dad Life' video is both hilarious and heartwarming! It's amazing to see this new chapter in your life, and you're rocking it as a dad.
this still feels surreal! I'm so happy for your family, Felix. One of the few YouTubers who grew up to be more wholesome.
Can’t wait for Bjorn to get to the age where he can use a computer and see all the hilarious stuff his dad has done
Soon he'll be wearing the dad shoes and watch TV while standing at a distance, we're so happy for you guys

Thank you Felix and Marzia for including us in your new journey both in Japan and as parents. It's so great to see both of you as happy and proud parents. You're doing great! Keep up the great work and thank you to Marzia for the fantastic edits!
I don't want to have kids myself but then I see stuff like this, and having a little family just seems so nice.

日本で子育てしてくれて
日本人としてはとても嬉しいし
なんだか、小さい事もありがたくて
幸せでいいんだなーってなんだか思いました
him flipping you the bird asking if he missed you guys was the funniest shit, im laughing so hard thats so cute hahahaha
Watching Felix's vlogs is like hearing from an old friend you used to hang out with. So heart warming
A smile is glued to my face whenever I watch these vlogs, they’re so wholesome.
I can't believe how much he's changed! I remember watching him scream at video games when I was younger. And now he's a dad with a bright future ahead of him. So proud of you, Pewds!
It's a true joy to see this man go from "happy wheels dad" to being actual dad
So happy to see Marzia doing well and making a return!
Watching new parents navigate parenthood is so refreshing. Capturing all these little precious moments as a family is such a good idea.
Money doesn’t change who you are, it amplifies who you already are. And clearly they were always good genuine wholesome human beings  so happy to see all the goodness
13:48 like father like son
Björn is getting so big since the last time you posted about him, he’s such a precious boy with amazing parents. He’s going to grow to be a very happy child, congratulations Felix
These vlogs are like an emotional support animal, seeing pewds happy just makes me happy honestly
I absolutely love Marzia edited vlogs; the best parts of the channel is following along with your lives. Thank you for sharing Baby Bjorn! It's a honor.
I love how you went from gaming slowly into your life and now youre a dad so happy for you.ily

Wow... I remember being 12/13 and watching PewdiePie gaming videos, and now Felix has a beautiful family and life! I'm so happy for him and Marzia. Seeing them so happy and full of love really warms my heart. Bjorn has wonderful parents

The way this is edited gives me so much nostalgia as a 90s kid growing up with home videos and vhs tapes. Bjorn is so lucky he will see from y’all efforts (great editing Marzia!!) how much love y’alls family contains and celebrates!!

Felix you certainly are living the dream life which you deserved .  been watching you for over a decade and both of us have come a long way . I hope the best of best for you martzia , bjorn edgar , momo  and all the bros out there
Their life is literally a movie, a sweet and soft one  this family is so cute
Marzia is definitely the prettiest mother Ive ever seen in my entire life
It's so sweet how they're living life so peacefully.

I'm so glad Mariza is doing so well after giving birth, that can be so taxing on your body, I hope she is taking care of herself and making sure to rest and letting herself heal. Make sure to take care of her Felix!!
